component.name: NFC Laboratory
component.summary: NFC signal sniffer and protocol decoder using SDR receiver

description.p: NFC Laboratory is a signal sniffer and protocol decoder using SDR receiver for demodulation and decoding NFC-A, NFC-B, NFC-F and NFC-V signals in real-time up to 424 Kbps. It also includes a logic analyzer for contact smart cards with protocol ISO7816.
This application requires USB access for SDR receivers (AirSpy, RTL-SDR, HydraSDR) and logic analyzers (DSLogic series). Appropriate udev rules must be installed on the host system for device access.

ul.li: Real-time NFC signal capture and demodulation
ISO7816 signal capture and decode for contact smart cards
Radio decoder for ISO14443-A, ISO14443-B, ISO15693 and ISO18092
Logic decoder for contact smart cards with ISO7816 protocol
Signal analysis and protocol timing visualization
Signal frame and protocol detail view
Export captures to compressed TRZ format
Import from WAV and compressed TRZ format
Support for AirSpy, RTL-SDR and HydraSDR receivers
Support for DreamSourceLab DSLogic Plus, Pro16 and Pro32 logic analyzers
